document.text:
From: "Zaveri, Mihir" < 
a 
To:
Subject: NYT inquiry: Jeffrey Epstein injured in jail? 
Date: Thu, 25 Jul 2019 03:02:13 +0000 
Hello, this is Mihir Zaveri, reporter at The New York Times. 
We are seeing reports that Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his jail cell after a possible suicide attempt or 
some sort of assault: https://www.nbcnewyork.cominews/localgeffrey-Epstein-Found-Injured-in-NYC-Jail-Cell-
After-Possible-Suicide-Attempt-or-Assault-Sources-513174311.html 
Hoping tonight to confirm this or get any insight into what might have actually happened and where he is right 
now. 
I can be reached at 
Mihir 
EFTA00016762
